meanings.definition: Most distant in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The furthest star in the sky twinkled brightly.
meanings.sent2: She pointed to the furthest tree in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased the furthest butterfly, thinking it was a tasty treat.
meanings.sent4: His memories of childhood felt like they were from the furthest past.
meanings.sent5: The furthest mountain peak seemed to touch the clouds.

meanings.definition: To the greatest extent or degree.
meanings.sent1: She furthested her efforts to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent2: He always furthests his arguments to win debates.
meanings.sent3: The chef furthested the flavors in the dish by adding extra spices.
meanings.sent4: The athlete furthests his training to prepare for the competition.
meanings.sent5: The teacher furthests her knowledge by attending workshops regularly.

meanings.definition: At or to the greatest distance in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The spaceship traveled furthest into the galaxy than any other.
meanings.sent2: She ran furthest in the race and won the gold medal.
meanings.sent3: The comedian's jokes always go furthest in making people laugh.
meanings.sent4: His love for her reaches furthest across the vast ocean of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The explorer ventured furthest into the uncharted territory.
